metadata.name: Farewell Messages
metadata.description:
//    We create this NFT as an eternal storage              //  
//    of the farewell messages for our beloved DD.    //  
//                              -- From members of JP BC team.     //

Thank you for everything. Wishing you loads of success and happiness for this next chapter of life in the US. --Aksh

Good luck to you and your family in US! Thank you for your great support! --Amau

You are the most motivated guy I ever met in the company. Thank you for everything, keep up the spirit and good luck with your new journey! --Yusm

May success be with you always and everywhere! --Ole

From a small business event to working together with you, it has been a great time. Thank you! --Nkzw

I wish you success in US. Let's go have a drink again. Thank you! --Enoh

Thanks to you DD I joined our blockchain family, in the 2 years under your mentorship I learned and grew a lot. Wish you a good journey there in US and we can find a bar and drink or take a cigarette together next time! --Joe

Thank you for being my counselor and paving my path to a consultant. --Xing

Thank you DD, and wish u have a better future in US! --Wang

Thank you for your GREAT contribution !  Without you, we could not have achieved our current growth. I look forward to having another drink with you in NY ! --Mats
